text: Alloh taolo ʙa mardonu zanoni mu'min ʙoƣhoe [az ʙihist] va'da dodaast, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on cori ast, covidona dar on xohand mond. Va [niz] xonahoi pokizae dar ʙihisthoi covidon [ʙa onon va'da dodaast] va xusnudii Alloh taolo [az hamai inho] ʙartar ast. In hamon [rastagori va] komjoʙii ʙuzurg ast
